zh.title: 澳大利亚惠特拉姆政府被总督解职
伊朗门事件丑闻公开，里根政府受质疑
玛丽·罗宾逊当选爱尔兰首位女总统
比尔·克林顿成功连任美国总统
萨达姆·侯赛因被判处绞刑
中国嫦娥一号成功进入月球轨道
巴西米纳斯吉拉斯州发生水坝溃坝事故
天堂文件泄露，揭露大规模避税行为
印度空间研究组织成功发射月船3号

en.title: Lynette Fromme, a follower of Charles Manson, sentenced to life.
Iran-Contra affair: Al-Shiraa magazine reports U.S. arms sales to Iran.
Mary Robinson elected as Ireland's first female president.
Bill Clinton re-elected as U.S. President.
Google unveils the Android mobile operating system.
Major flooding occurs in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, killing over 100.
Paradise Papers, leaked documents about offshore investments, released.
One World Trade Center officially opens in New York City.
Joe Biden defeats Donald Trump in US presidential election.
